subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: As the Mets have lost 10 of their last 14 games and watched a comfortable seven-game bulge vanish, David Wright has been one of their most productive hitters.
snippet: As the Mets have lost 10 of their last 14 games and watched a comfortable seven-game bulge vanish, David Wright has been one of their most productive hitters.
